飢不擇食.definition: when hungry, you can't pick what you eat (idiom); beggars can't be choosers; When matters are urgent, don't spend time choosing alternatives.

飢寒交迫.definition: beset by hunger and cold (idiom); starving and freezing; in desperate poverty

飢渴.definition: hungry and thirsty; (fig.) to crave (knowledge, love etc)

飢腸轆轆.definition: (idiom) stomach rumbling with hunger; very hungry
